subscription.weKnow: Sabemos que tienes una hermosa e interesante historia.
subscription.receive: Recibe un tema de conversación al día. Pruébanos GRATIS por un mes (luego solo $4.99/mes).
subscription.recurring: At Yester is recurring subscription. If you decide to purchase a subscription, an initial payment will be charged to you iTunes account. Shortly before the endo of each subscription period, your account will be charged. Auto-renewal may be disabled at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes sotre after purchase. For more information, please see our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
lorem_lbl1: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Praesent tincidunt mi ligula. Phasellus erat metus, dictum.
onboarding.step1.title: We can't wait to hear
onboarding.step1.description: Everyone has a story to tell. We know yours is definitely a really interesting one.
onboarding.step2.title: One day, one story
onboarding.step2.description: We'll guide you through daily question that will help us to get the conversation to get started.
onboarding.step3.title: You own your information
onboarding.step3.description: As you, we want to protect your personal information, so you decide when and with who you share it. Always!
setup.age.greeting.subtitle: Ese es un gran nombre! Ahora, conozcámonos un poco mejor para comenzar
setup.age.question: ¿Cuándo viste esta hermosa Tierra por primera vez?
setup.age.disclaimer: We collect this information to set your experience within the app
